ratesCalculator.disclaimer: These figures represent an example of the average incremental costs per additional occupied room in 3, 4 and 5-star hotels in Western markets. Actual costs may vary and should be adjusted according to each hotel's category, service level, location and operating model.
ratesCalculator.beforeStartingDescription:
Building your custom model is a crucial step to maximize your revenue opportunities.
We strongly recommend that you carefully review the "TIPS & STRATEGIC GUIDELINES" section first.
These recommendations will help you design a model fully adapted to your hotel's category, capacity, and audience profile.
Once you have studied the guidelines, you may proceed to download and use the Online Calculator located on the right.

buildYourModel.title: BUILD YOUR OWN MODEL
buildYourModel.description: Create a custom pricing model for your hotel

ratesCalculator.utilitiesGuestsNotTransients: HOTEL-LIVING GUESTS ARE NOT TRANSIENT TOURISTS
ratesCalculator.utilitiesDescription1: They are respectful long-stay residents who remain for 8, 16, 24 or 32 days.
ratesCalculator.utilitiesDescription2: Due to the longer duration of stays and the more personal relationship they establish with your property, these guests tend to be more conscious in their use of resources.
ratesCalculator.utilitiesDescription3: They feel more like temporary tenants than short-stay visitors ‚Äî and that makes all the difference.
ratesCalculator.utilitiesLowerConsumption: UTILITY CONSUMPTION IS LOWER AND MORE STABLE
ratesCalculator.utilitiesEnergyEfficiency: ENERGY EFFICIENCY SYSTEMS (such as LED lighting and moderate climate control) are even more effective
ratesCalculator.utilitiesConservativeHabits: FEELING AT HOME, guests naturally adopt more conservative habits
ratesCalculator.utilitiesResponsibilityDescription:
Since Hotel-Living offers accessible rates, guests are usually aware and respectful of the opportunity they are given.
They know this model depends on balance, care and sustainability ‚Äî and most act accordingly.
ratesCalculator.utilitiesOptimizedDescription: Thanks to lower room turnover and simplified cleaning protocols, utility usage remains constant and optimized, with fewer peaks in electricity or water demand.
ratesCalculator.cleaningHotelLivingStandard: HOTEL-LIVING MEANS A NEW HOSPITALITY STANDARD
ratesCalculator.cleaningFeelsLikeHome: ONE THAT FEELS MORE LIKE HOME.
ratesCalculator.cleaningDescription1: Unlike traditional hotels with daily cleaning, our approach reflects the pace of real life.
ratesCalculator.cleaningDescription2: Just like someone living at home might receive light help a few times a week, our guests enjoy attentive and discreet care that respects their independence and comfort.
ratesCalculator.cleaningCompleteDescription: A complete room cleaning every 7 days ensures hygiene and freshness, with minimal intrusion.
ratesCalculator.cleaningLightRefreshDescription: Small optional touch-ups ‚Äî üóëÔ∏è trash removal, üß∫ light tidying, üå¨Ô∏è ventilation ‚Äî are available, respecting privacy and lifestyle.
ratesCalculator.cleaningBedChangeDescription: Sheets and towels are renewed regularly, following home comfort standards.
ratesCalculator.cleaningOperationalDescription:
This model reduces operational costs for hotels, while offering guests a residential experience:

‚Ä¢	Fewer interruptions
‚Ä¢	More privacy
‚Ä¢	The feeling of truly belonging ‚Äî not just staying.
